title: What was Selena Quintanilla like as a person? - Quora

response.answer_text: I had a conversation once with an author(he wrote a book about her) who met with her about 6 months before she was killed. He met with her on her bus and said she was pretty much the way the movie Selena portrays her. She told him she was wanting to break away and do her own thing. I’ve read that she was a genuine, unassuming person.
